title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Magnetism in dilute system, ligand field and orbital moment quenching, magnetism of interacting system , direct and indirect exchange interaction, mean field theory of ferro- anti-ferro- and ferri- magnet, spin wave and its interaction, itinerant magnetism, Hubbard model, spin density wave, spin fluctuation, magnetic resonance, magnetic anisotropy and domain, review of experimental results on low and high T_c superconductor, thermodynamics and phenomenological theory, electron-phonon interaction, Cooper pair, BCS theory, ground state, energy gap, transition temperature, flux quantization, GL theory. Tunneling and Josephson effect, superconducting devices.
